title: Ep. 13 - 2 Bears 1 Cave 2 w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: On today's 2 Bears 1 Cave the music video that shook the internet to it's core is first seen by Bert Kreischer. This episode was recorded right as Tom Segura dropped his legendary music video and we get Bert's first reaction to seeing it for the first time. Plus, Tom has just shot his NETFLIX special as Bert is gearing up to shoot his.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
